name: Greaterrr Than
description:
Who’s older, sharks or trees? Oxford or the Aztec Empire? Who’s faster, Usain Bolt or a cheetah? Did dinosaurs walk on grass?

Test your knowledge with the game of interesting comparisons.

“It’s real simple … I like it a whole lot.”
– Scott Johnson, The Morning Stream “Oh, wow.” (At one of the comparisons)
– Brian Ibbott, The Morning Stream
